# The `FunctionVarLocsBuilder` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper class to build <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionvarlocs">FunctionVarLocs</a>, since that class isn&#39;t easy to modify. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Helper class to build <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionvarlocs">FunctionVarLocs</a>, since that class isn&#39;t easy to modify.

TODO: There&#39;s not a great deal of value in the split, it could be worth merging the two classes.

Definition at line 101 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/assignmenttrackinganalysis-cpp">AssignmentTrackingAnalysis.cpp</a>.
